data.name: 0002 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's about yesterday at the Café.

data.name: 0003 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Haruhi's ears pricked up when she heard "unnatural phenomenon".

data.name: 0005 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: "Tomorrow morning, we'll meet at school! Bring whatever you need for staying the night!"

data.name: 0004 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: She stole my phone, and after interrogating Taniguchi...

data.name: 0007 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, with a few too many bonuses included.

data.name: 0008 (361.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Sorry, I'm a little late.

data.name: 0009 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: You're late, Kyon!

data.name: 0010 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Didn't I tell you that anyone who's late gets the death penalty!?

data.name: 0011 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: The punishment for making the SOS Brigade leader wait under the burning sun is severe!

data.name: 0012 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The death penalty for being just 5 minutes late, you say?

data.name: 0014 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Incidentally, the rest of the group is already assembled. As always.

data.name: 0015 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: They're all genuinely incredible when it comes to following orders, with room to spare.

data.name: 0017 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Of course, to Asahina. Oh and you too Nagato, sorry.

data.name: 0018 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ok Kyon, prepare yourself!

data.name: 0019 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: First we'll drag you around the school grounds, then we'll behead you.

data.name: 0020 (361.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Koizumi, I'll let you do the execution.

data.name: 0021 (361.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It is an honour.

data.name: 0022 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: ……You call that an honour?

data.name: 0025 (361.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: Ehehe, morning!

data.name: 0000 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: With that being said, it was the next morning.

data.name: 0001 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's called a summer break, yet right now I've come to school. Brigade leader's orders of course.

data.name: 0006 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Since she said so, I came from early in the morning to climb this stupidly long hill road.

data.name: 0013 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Don't you know our ancestor's great proverb, "condemn the offense, but not the offender"?

data.name: 0016 (361.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Though, it's hard to deny that even though it's the morning, these harsh rays of sun are hard to endure.
